text: The Waldorf Astoria Chicago, formerly the Elysian Hotel Chicago, is a luxury hotel located at 11 East Walton Street in the Gold Coast area of Chicago, Illinois. Construction began in 2006 and was open in 2010. It stands at 686 ft (209 m). ==Other websites== * Waldorf Astoria Chicago Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:2010 establishments in Illinois
title: Waldorf Astoria Chicago
